scripts.clean:install: rm -rf node_modules && npm cache clean --force && npm install
scripts.cy:parallel: CYPRESS_API_URL='http://localhost:1234/' cy2 run --browser chrome  --record --key XXX --parallel --ci-build-id 'Global run'
scripts.cy:parallel:group_1: CYPRESS_API_URL='http://192.168.1.92:1234/' cy2 run --spec 'cypress/integration/group_1.spec.js' --browser chrome --group spec/1  --record --key key1 --parallel --ci-build-id Group_1_`date +%s`
